languages.text:
Схема приоритетно-фронтального бронирования, сосредотачивающая наиболее толстые адамантиумные бронеплиты на {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовом{/g} отсеке судна и позволяющая кораблю прорваться сквозь шквальный огонь решительным натиском.
~// +4 к прочности носовой обшивки. Таран вызывает у цели {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренние пожары{/g}, количество пожаров зависит от размера цели

This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantine armour plates in the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target
languages.original_text:
Схема приоритетно-фронтального бронирования, сосредотачивающая наиболее толстые адамантиумные бронеплиты на {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовом{/g} отсеке судна и позволяющая кораблю прорваться сквозь шквальный огонь решительным натиском.
~// +4 к прочности носовой обшивки. Таран вызывает у цели {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}внутренние пожары{/g}, количество пожаров зависит от размера цели

traits.locale_text: This front-focused armouring design concentrates the thickest adamantium armour plates in the ship's prow compartment, which allows the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.

This front-focused armouring design concentrates the thickest adamantium armour plates in the ship's prow compartment, which allows the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.

This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantium armour plates in the ship's prow compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the flagship causes internal fires, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantine armour plates in the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantine armour plates in the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

languages.text:
Este blindaje frontal concentra las placas más densas de adamantino en el compartimento de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} de la nave, permitiendo que atraviese fuego intenso en un avance imparable.
~// +4 al blindaje de proa. El ariete de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} inflige {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendios internos{/g}. El número de incendios depende del tamaño del objetivo.
languages.original_text:
This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantine armour plates in the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

traits.locale_text: Este blindaje frontal concentra las placas más densas de adamantio en el compartimento de proa de la nave, permitiendo que atraviese fuego intenso en un avance imparable.

languages.text:
Ce blindage frontal concentre les plaques d'adamantine les plus épaisses à la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} du vaisseau, ce qui lui permet d'avancer sans relâche à travers un feu nourri.
~// Blindage de la proue +4. Le bélier du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} provoque des {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}incendies internes{/g}, dont le nombre de foyers dépend de la taille de la cible.
languages.original_text:
This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantine armour plates in the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

traits.locale_text: Ce blindage frontal concentre les plaques d'adamantium les plus épaisses à la proue du vaisseau, ce qui lui permet d'avancer sans relâche à travers un feu nourri.

languages.text:
这种设计着力于保护飞船的前半部分，将最为厚重的精金装甲全都堆到{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}舱室，保证飞船可以在敌人的狂轰滥炸中突出重围。
~// 舰首护甲提高4点。此外，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的撞角撞击会导致目标爆发{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}，火灾数量取决于目标尺寸。
languages.original_text:
This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantine armour plates in the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

traits.locale_text:
这种设计着力于保护飞船的前半部分，将最为厚重的精金装甲全都堆到{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}舱室，保证飞船可以在敌人的狂轰滥炸中突出重围。
~// 舰首护甲提高4点。此外，{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的撞角撞击会导致目标爆发{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火灾{/g}，火灾数量取决于目标尺寸。

languages.text:
この前面集中型の装甲は、最も厚いアダマンチウム装甲板を{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}コンパートメントに集中させる設計がなされている。これにより、容赦なく押し寄せる敵の激しい砲火を突破することを可能にしている。
~//{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}船首{/g}のメッキが+4増加する。旗艦の衝角は{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}内部火災{/g}を引き起こすため、数は標的の大きさによって砲撃数は異なる
languages.original_text:
This front-focused armour design concentrates the thickest adamantine armour plates in the ship's {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} compartment, allowing the ship to break through heavy enemy fire during a relentless push.
~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

traits.locale_text: この前面集中型の装甲は、最も厚いアダマンチウム装甲板を船首コンパートメントに集中させる設計がなされている。これにより、容赦なく押し寄せる敵の激しい砲火を突破することを可能にしている。

この前面集中型の装甲は、最も厚いアダマンチウム装甲板を船首コンパートメントに集中させる設計がなされている。これにより、容赦なく押し寄せる敵の激しい砲火を突破することを可能にしている。
~//船首のメッキが+4増加する。旗艦の衝角は内部火災を引き起こすため、数は標的の大きさによって砲撃数は異なる

languages.text:
Bei dieser Frontpanzerung befinden sich die dicksten Adamant-Platten am {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} des Schiffs. Dadurch ist es möglich, schweres feindliches Feuer einfach zu durchbrechen.
~// +4 auf Bugpanzerung. Der Rammbock des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}interne Brände{/g}, deren Anzahl von der Größe des Ziels abhängt
languages.original_text:

~// +4 to the prow plating. The ram of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} causes {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g}, the number of fires depends on the size of the target

traits.locale_text: Bei dieser Frontpanzerung befinden sich die dicksten Adamantium-Platten am Bug des Schiffs. Dadurch ist es möglich, schweres feindliches Feuer einfach zu durchbrechen.

Bei dieser Frontpanzerung befinden sich die dicksten Adamantium-Platten am Bug des Schiffs. Dadurch ist es möglich, schweres feindliches Feuer einfach zu durchbrechen.
~// +4 auf Bugpanzerung. Der Rammbock des Flaggschiffs verursacht interne Brände, deren Anzahl von der Größe des Ziels abhängt

languages.text:
Bu ön kısma odaklı zırh tasarımı, en kalın adamantin zırh plakalarını geminin {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}pruva{/g} tarafına yoğunlaştırarak geminin amansız hücumlar sırasında ağır düşman ateşini yarıp geçmesini sağlar.
~// Pruva kaplamasına +4. {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} koçbaşı vuruşu, {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}iç yangınlara{/g} sebep olur. Yangınların sayısı, hedefin boyutuna göre değişir.
